remarks: Condition for colinear functionals to have equal kernels.  (Contributed by NM, 20-Mar-2015.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
lkrlspeq.f $e |- F = ( LFnl ` W ) $.
lkrlspeq.l $e |- L = ( LKer ` W ) $.
lkrlspeq.d $e |- D = ( LDual ` W ) $.
lkrlspeq.o $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` D ) $.
lkrlspeq.j $e |- N = ( LSpan ` D ) $.
lkrlspeq.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LVec ) $.
lkrlspeq.h $e |- ( ph -> H e. F ) $.
lkrlspeq.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. ( ( N ` { H } ) \ { .0. } ) ) $.
lkrlspeqN $p |- ( ph -> ( L ` G ) = ( L ` H ) ) $.
